name: Lost Stranded Island Survival 3D
description:
Start your survival on the desert island!
Face the hard reality. Hunt for animals, craft tools, and try to escape from the stranded island. Maintain your energy. Find or craft treasures. Explore lost places full of desert mystery. Craft survival tools - it helps to explore the desert island! No guarantee you can continue your stranded survival. But you can try to find your way to home.

Is there any escape from lost stranded island? Earn money for survival and craft. Survive on the desert island full of dangers! Use everything for survival. There are a lot of craft recipes. You need them all for your survival. Live the life of adventurer! Enjoy desert island 3D views. Discover all craft secrets of stranded island. Spend your evening with craft in Lost Stranded Island Survival 3D, live the life of the stranded man!

Features of Lost Stranded Island Survival 3D:

- Stranded survival atmosphere
- Craft possibility
- 3D graphics
- Lost desert island
- Dangerous animals
- Sounds of nature
- Craft recipes
- Desert locations
- Survival guide

Are your ready for stranded life? Your goal is survival on the lost island! Hunt and craft to stay alive on the desert island. Upgrade your survival skills and craft resources to stay on the stranded land. Enjoy stranded life on a lost desert island! Craft very useful tools. Be accurate, don't forget to keep your survival indicators. Animals on the lost island can kill you. Be ready to craft for your survival. Search for anything you can craft. Don't wait for stranded help. You have no chance without craft on the lost stranded island.

Dive into the desert survival atmosphere of Lost Stranded Island Survival 3D. Spend time on the desert island in the survival simulator! Choose a desert life of lost stranded adventurer on the island. What to craft for survival? Are these stranded animals lost too? Ok, inside Lost Stranded Island Survival 3D you have tips how to craft, but you are still lost. Escape from the lost island or fight with desert land. Keep your survival of the lost stranded adventurer.

Lost Stranded Island Survival 3D is for real men. Use all your skills to hunt, craft and not to get lost. Maintain your energy for craft on stranded island. Watch other parameters - stranded animals can hurt you. Try stranded survival adventures against them. Explore desert island - the ocean, hills, trees. Walk, jump, swim, craft. Discover all lost secrets of desert land. Be careful. Craft on the lost desert island is hard. Craft and fight with animals, they are against your desert survival. Turn this lost desert island into your desert home. Use a survival craft guide to stay here.

Tired of boring desert life? Try the survival adventures on the stranded island right now, become a lost man. Be ready for attack and craft. Find alone all lost treasures of the island. But avoid dangerous animals on the lost desert island, they are looking for you right now. Collect and craft resources. Move around the desert island to craft the lost secrets. You can find something interesting in lost places. Control a lost stranded character: run, kick, craft.

Craft to stay alive, escape yourself from the lost desert island, kill the animals.
Start your survival! Try our Lost Stranded Island Survival 3D, it is so cool!
And don't forget to send your ideas about craft to game developers.
